<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_sync_history</collection> <condition>current.name.nil()</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Auto-create name</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[switch (current.type.toString()) { case 'push': current.name = gs.getMessage("Pushed to {0}", current.instance.getDisplayValue()); break;
case 'pull': current.name = gs.getMessage("Pulled from {0}", current.instance.getDisplayValue()); break;
default: current.name = gs.getMessage("{0} on {1}", current.type.getDisplayValue(), current.instance.getDisplayValue()); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2013-06-13 20:09:00</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>07b01c0cc3420100bac1addbdfba8f52</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Auto-create name</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Team Development" source="com.snc.apps_hub">cfa3b4643c31311068bcf327dfe37fd6</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_07b01c0cc3420100bac1addbdfba8f52</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-10-10 23:01:55</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=07b01c0cc3420100bac1addbdfba8f52"/> </record_update>
